armors.name: Abbess Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theAbbessenemy.

armors.name: Abiding Defender Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theAbiding Defenderenemy.

armors.name: Andreas of Ebb's Set
armors.description: Upper Calrath: The sleeves and leggings pieces of this armor set drop fromAndreas of Ebb (Boss)after defeating him. The boss battle triggers after fighting The Lightreaper and when you are heading towards the gates of Bramis Castle.

armors.name: Angel of the Void Set
armors.description: Forsaken Fen: After picking up thePyric Cultist Staff, go to the bridge and jump down to the right. Destroy all theUmbral Eggsin the area, then look back at the bridge and soulflay the body on it to weaken the Umbral Tumor. At the end of this area, there are some pieces of wood you can cut down to reveal another body to soulflay, again weakening the tumor. With three bodies soulflayed, the Umbral Tumor will fade away, opening a way between this area and the lake. Do not head to the unblocked path yet. Facing the direction where the Umbral Tumor is previously located, take a sharp turn to the left and follow the path. Underneath a bridge, and in an alcove on the right at the corner, you can open a chest that contains theAngel of the Void Set, which consists ofAngel of the Void Armour,Angel of the Void Mask,Angel of the Void Gloves, andAngel of the Void Trousers.

armors.name: Antique Hallowed Sentinel Set
armors.description: Pilgrim's Perch: From theVestige of Blind Agatha, enter the tunnel on the right. Once you reach the waterfall, use yourUmbral Lampto transition to the Umbral realm, then drop down and continue following the path on the right and stick to the right side. Be careful of some enemies and the explosives stuck on the wall. Turn left once you see a table with lit candles on your right, there should also be candelabra on your left as you turn. Once you enter the room, there's a chest containing theAntique Hallowed Sentinel Set.

armors.name: Ardent Penitent Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theArdent Penitentenemy.

armors.name: Avowed Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theAvowedenemy.

armors.name: Blackfeather Ranger Set
armors.description: Starting set for theBlackfeather Ranger

armors.name: Bones Set
armors.description: Skyrest Bridge: The whole set can be purchased from theShrine of the Putrid Mother.

armors.name: Byron's Set
armors.description: Skyrest Bridge:Winterberrysells the pieces of this armor set if you complete the quest line "Find the Thief". Completing the quest will triggerByronandWinterberryto move toSkyrest Bridgeand add new wares (including the complete set) to the merchant's shop.

armors.name: Calrath Guardsman Set
armors.description: Upper CalrathB (accessed after completing the "Cistern" location): The Armor set can be found inside a chest on a Terrace. This chest will be close to the former invisible ladder that can be triggered to appear. From the Ladder Head up to drop down to the platform, cross to the other side, and climb a shorter ladder. You'll find a chest on the terrace containing (Would need to activate the platform by going to the Umbral)

armors.name: Carrion Knight Set
armors.description: The skirt piece for this armor set drops from theBlessed Carrion Knight Sanishoupon defeating the boss at theTower of Penance.

armors.name: Condemned Set
armors.description: Starting set for theCondemned

armors.name: Conflagrant Seer Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theConflagrant Seerenemy.

armors.name: Corrupted Cleric's Set
armors.description: Requires theRemembrance of Judge Cleric The Radiant Sentinelfor the pieces of this armor set to be purchasable fromMolhuatSkyrest Bridge.

armors.name: Corrupted Penitent Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theCorrupted Penitentenemy.

armors.name: Corrupted Pilgrim Set
armors.description: The whole set can be purchased from theDamarose the MarkedinPilgrim's Perch(Unconfirmed)

armors.name: Crimson Rector Set
armors.description: The gauntlet piece drops as a reward upon defeating the boss,Crimson Rector PercivalatFitzroy's Gorge. This boss is guarding the settlement with huge wooden structures. This is the same area where you will unlock the lift shortcut to Skyrest Bridge.

armors.name: Cursed Set
armors.description: Manse of the Hallowed Brothers: After the gatehouse past the first Manse Vestige, Eventually you will encounter a Bone Bridge, Cross the bone bridge past the Umbral Tumor, then climb up the stairs to the top. A Bringer of Stillness and several Remnants will be waiting for you. When defeated, the Bringer of Stillness may drop aRegular Deralium Nugget, aVestige Seed, andDimexus. The Umbral Belly will drop theCursed Setwhen soulflayed. There will also be an Emergence Effigy you can interact with nearby to return to theAxiom.

armors.name: Damarose's Set
armors.description: The full armor set drops fromDamarose the Marked.

armors.name: Descrier Guide Set
armors.description: Skyrest Bridge: When you reach the circular structure after opening the door with theSkyrest Bridge Key, there is a soulflay target. Circle to the left of the structure, to find first aFaint Vigor Skulland then the wholeDescrier Guide Setinside a chest.

armors.name: Despair's Set
armors.description: Pieces for this armor set can drop from theWomb of Despairenemy that is encountered in various locations in the Umbral Realm.

armors.name: Drustan's Set
armors.description: CompleteDrustan'squest:Brothers of Mournstead. Found on the balcony of the broken tower inBramis Castle, next to aStigmaand loot. The one in front of the stigma is a fake where aRavenous Fascinatorwill ambush players. This loot will giveMelchior's Ring,Boar's Head Shield,Drustan's Hammer,Drustan's Glove, andDrustan's Garb.

armors.name: Elianne the Starved's Set
armors.description: Skyrest Bridge: Purchasable fromMolhuafter acquiring theRemembrance of Elianne the Starved.

armors.name: Enslaved Miner Set
armors.description: Sunless Skein: This set is dropped byEnslaved MinerEnemieswho are commonly found in the Hoist section in Sunless Skein.

armors.name: Exacter Set
armors.description: Requires completion of Exacter Dunmire's quest chain. For more information and clarity, we highly suggest checkingExacter Dunmire's Questline.

armors.name: Exiled Stalker Set
armors.description: Starting set for theExiled Stalkerclass.

armors.name: Failed Pilgrim's Set
armors.description: Set pieces drop fromThehk-Ihiron the upper floor of the Monastery atThe Empyrean, overlooking the boss arena of Judge Cleric. Please visit the "The Rejected Pilgrim" page to learn more about Thehk-Ihir's quest line.

armors.name: Faithless Set
armors.description: Skyrest Bridge: The whole set can be purchased from theShrine of Orius

armors.name: Fetid Sacrifice Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theFetid Sacrificeenemy.

armors.name: Fitzroy's Set
armors.description: Fitzroy's Gorge: After picking up anAnimated Vigor Skullon the corpse near some breakable objects at the top of the tower, across from it you'll see a tiny gap on the wall to your right. Outside, you can proceed on a narrow path to keep heading up the tower through a ladder at the end. Carefully cross the wooden beam to another ladder up. At the top, you're rewarded for your climb with a chest containingFitzroy's Set.See it on the LotF Fitzroy's Gorge Map.

armors.name: Fungal Bowman Set
armors.description: Drops fromFungal Bowman

armors.name: Hallowed Knight Set
armors.description: Starting set for theHallowed Knight

armors.name: Harrower Set
armors.description: Requires theRemembrance of the Unbroken Promisefor the set to be purchasable fromMolhuatSkyrest Bridge.

armors.name: Holy Bulwark Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theHoly Bulwarkenemy.

armors.name: Hushed Saint's Set
armors.description: Requires theRemembrance of the Hushed Saintfor the pieces of this set to be purchasable fromMolhuatSkyrest Bridge.

armors.name: Iselle's Set
armors.description: Use theEmpowered Rune of Adyrwhen interacting withIselleto acquire the full set.

armors.name: J'deyl Set
armors.description: Fief of the Chill Curse: From theUmbral Flowerbedby the ravine, continue along the ruined houses and rooftops. when you reach a large area with a set of stairs, head up the stairs until you find a chest. Open it and pick up theJ'deyl Setwhich consists of x1J'deyl Skull Helm, x1J'deyl Bone Armour, x1J'deyl Bone Gloves, x1J'deyl Trousers.

armors.name: Judge Cleric's Set
armors.description: Requires theRemembrance of Judge Cleric The Radiant Sentinelfor the pieces of this armor set to be purchasable fromMolhuatSkyrest Bridge.

armors.name: Kinrangr Guardian Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theKinrangr Guardianenemy.

armors.name: Kinrangr Hunter Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theKinrangr Hunterenemy.

armors.name: Knight of Adyr Set
armors.description: Fitzroy's Gorge: Can be purchased with Severed Hands at theShrine of Adyr. From theVestige of Betrayed Eliard, simply continue on the path and turn the corner to see a body on a throne with red lighting and several severed hands and chains.

armors.name: Kukajin's Set
armors.description: Skyrest Bridge: Found in one of the alcoves in the Sleeping Quarters. This is also the same spot where you used to payKukajin's Invoice.

armors.name: Lightreaper's Set
armors.description: Requires theRemembrance of the Lightreaperfor the pieces of this armor set to be purchasable fromMolhuatSkyrest Bridge.

armors.name: Lord Set
armors.description: Starting equipment of theLordclass.

armors.name: Marksman Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theMarksmanenemy.

armors.name: Mournstead Infantry Set
armors.description: Starting Equipment for theMournstead Infantryclass.

armors.name: Neophyte Set
armors.description: The whole set can be purchased fromExacter DunmireinSkyrest Bridge

armors.name: Noblewoman Set
armors.description: Upper CalrathB (accessed after completingCistern): From theVestige of the Forgotten Guardianat theCistern, open the nearby doors if you haven't already to get to a later section ofUpper Calrath. Turn right when you exit the doors and head down the slope. If you haven't already removed the Umbral Tumor at the base of the slope, you can find the body you need to soulflay by looking up about halfway down the slope. You can reach it by taking the Umbral ladder up to the building anInfernal Enchantressis standing on. Make your way to the base of the slope, then cross through the metal gates in theUmbral. Heading forward takes you to a large courtyard filled with petrified bodies. Head through the doorway on the other side that has a red hue to it and take the stairs past it upwards. Pass by the Stigma at the top of the stairs and drop down to the lower slope. Turn right to find a second Stigma and walk past it. At the bottom of the stairs, hop down onto the top of a green tent, then hop down onto the ground below. Turn left, then head past a third Stigma and go through the archway ahead. Enter the building on the right, where you'll pass by a hallway resembling a marketplace, and at the end, turn left to immediately find theNoblewoman Seton a corpse.

armors.name: Orian Preacher Set
armors.description: Starting set for theOrian Preacher.

armors.name: Overseer Set
armors.description: Upper CalrathA: In the Upper Calrath A and in the area near the Emergence Effigy, and past it a spiral staircase going up and down. Head up one floor to find theOverseer Trousers,Overseer Garb,Overseer Mask, andOverseer Gloves, all in a chest.

armors.name: Paladin Set
armors.description: Starting equipment of theDark Crusaderclass.

armors.name: Partisan Set
armors.description: Starting set for thePartisan

armors.name: Pieta's Set
armors.description: Requires theRemembrance of Pieta, She of Blessed Renewalfor the pieces of this armor set to be purchasable fromMolhuatSkyrest Bridge.

armors.name: Pilgrim Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from thePilgrimenemy.

armors.name: Prole Set
armors.description: Lower Calrath: TheProle Hat,Prole Garb,Prole Wrappings, and theProle Trouserswill be obtained together below the stairs on the lower floor of the  Lower Calrath Alehouse where you can also obtain theMap of Calrath Slumsin another room with the Vestige of Lydia the Numb Witch (Lower Calrath Alehouse). InLower Calrath, players will need to Soulflay a bridge to get across to reach the village slums. You'll pass the VillageUmbral Flowerbed. Across the flowerbed is a small ramp leading into the inner parts of the buildings also known as the Calrath Slums. These buildings are lined with wooden platforms that can be used to get around. Make your way across and there will be a building with an opening. This is the alehouse. Enter the next room through the broken wall and head down the stairs. Loot the item below the stairs to obtain the Prole Set.

armors.name: Proselyte Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theProselyteenemy.

armors.name: Pureblade Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from thePurebladeenemy.

armors.name: Purger Set
armors.description: Skyrest Bridge: Can be purchased fromExacter Dunmire. Requires a specific heretical item to be given to Exacter Dunmire to expand the merchant's inventory and for this item to appear in the shop.

armors.name: Putrid Child Set
armors.description: Starting equipment of thePutrid Childclass.

armors.name: Pyric Cultist Set
armors.description: Starting equipment for thePyric Cultistclass

armors.name: Radiant Purifier Set
armors.description: Starting equipment of theRadiant Purifierclass.

armors.name: Rapturous Huntress Set
armors.description: Abbey of the Hallowed Sisters: The helm piece drops as a reward upon defeating the boss,Rapturous Huntress of the Dusk.

armors.name: Ravager Set
armors.description: Skyrest Bridge: Can be purchased fromExacter Dunmire. You would need to give himRavager Gregory's Rosaryto expand his inventory and purchase the armor set pieces from him.

armors.name: Raw Mangler Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theRaw Manglerenemy.

armors.name: Ruiner Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theRuinerenemy.

armors.name: Sacred Resonance Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theReceiver of Sacred Resonanceenemy.

armors.name: Scourged Sister Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theScourged Sisterenemy.

armors.name: Shuja Strider Set
armors.description: Forsaken Fen: Set pieces can randomly drop from theShuja Striderenemy.

armors.name: Shuja Warrior Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theShuja Warriorenemy.

armors.name: Sin-Piercer Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theSin-Piercerenemy.

armors.name: Skinstealer Set
armors.description: Set pieces can randomly drop from theSkinstealerenemy.

armors.name: Stillness Set
armors.description: Drops fromBringer of Stillness

armors.name: The Iron Wayfarer's Set
armors.description: This set drops fromThe Iron Wayfarerif you use theWithered Rune of Adyron him, killing theNPC.

armors.name: Thorned Penitent Set
armors.description: Pilgrim's Perch

armors.name: Tortured Prisoner's Set
armors.description: Skyrest Bridge: Hand theSearing Accusationto theTortured Prisoner. Rest at a vestige and when you return to her location, you will find the bars melted, as well as theTortured Prisoner's Head Cage.

armors.name: Udirangr Warwolf Set
armors.description: Starting equipment for theUdirangr Warwolfclass.

armors.name: Vanguard Set
armors.description: Can be purchased fromExacter DunmireinSkyrest Bridge. Requires theVanguard Barros' Rosaryto be given toExacter Dunmireto expand the merchant's inventory and for this item to appear in the shop.

gestures.name: Agreeing
gestures.description: Available by default

gestures.name: Disagreeing
gestures.description: Available by default

gestures.name: Greeting
gestures.description: Available by default

gestures.name: Pointing Downward
gestures.description: Available by default

gestures.name: Pointing Forward
gestures.description: Available by default

gestures.name: Pointing Upward
gestures.description: Available by default

gestures.name: Dark Crusader's Challenge
gestures.description: Interact with Exacter Dunmire at Skyrest for the first time.

gestures.name: Putrid Mother's Embrace
gestures.description: Interact with the Shrine of the Putrid Mother next to Molhu at Skyrest for the first time.

gestures.name: Orian Vow Of Protection
gestures.description: Interact with the Shrine of Orius next to Nathaniel at Skyrest for the first time.

gestures.name: Common Orian Prayer
gestures.description: Once you've beaten Scourged Sister Delyth, head to Pilgrim's Perch. Climb a ladder, move ahead, and you'll spot another ladder. Go up that one too. At the top, step into the Umbral realm. Use Soulflay on the platform to make it to the other side.

gestures.name: Beckoning
gestures.description: Interact with Thehk-Ihir outside Skyrest for the first time.

gestures.name: Crimson Ritual Fervou
gestures.description: Reach the Shrine of Adyr and interact with it for the first time.

gestures.name: Pledge To Adyr
gestures.description: From Upper Calrath Mining District/Vestige of Doln, continue forward until you reach the outside of the alley. Descend to the lower level, and you'll discover loot near some wooden sticks, close to a spellcaster enemy. Collect it to obtain the gesture.

gestures.name: Halting
gestures.description: During your journey in the Fief of the Chill Curse, you'll explore an ice cave. About halfway through the cave, you'll discover a loot that contains the gesture.

gestures.name: Hallowed Sentinel
gestures.description: Just before you reach the spot where you meet Stomund at the Abbey of the Hallowed Sisters, there's an area with a tree in the center. At the base of the tree, you can find the loot holding the gesture.

gestures.name: Calrath Noble's Bow
gestures.description: Interact with the Tortured Prisoner at the entrance of the Pieta boss arena in Skyrest.

gestures.name: Bemoaning
gestures.description: Interact with Byron at Sunless Skein Hoist/Vestige of Catrin.

gestures.name: Celebration
gestures.description: Interact with Winterberry at Revelation Depths.

gestures.name: Surrender
gestures.description: To achieve this, you must progress through the Iron Wayfarer quest.

gestures.name: Wheezing
gestures.description: You need to progress through Drustan quest to achieve this.

gestures.name: Laughter
gestures.description: You need to follow Damarose the Marked quest to get this gesture.

rings.name: Ring of the First of the Beasts
